data.name: Kaiju Catastrophe
data.detailed_description:
Join The Discord



The result of forbidden genetic manipulation and warped by super science wreak havoc on humanity mutating your giant monster with devastating attacks, unlocking new permanent evolutions, and a ever expanding roster of Kaijus. Devastate unique cities inflicting as much damage possible before you succumb to your injuries and show humanity the true face of destruction!

A Monstrous Menagerie

Pick from a variety of giant monsters with their own weaknesses, strengths, and unique weapons to destroy humanity!

Grow Stronger Every Life

Give your kaiju new and interesting evolutions that can as simply boost their baseline stats or give them interesting tactical options as they rampage across the globe.

Destruction Has It's Benefits

Giant monsters aren't cheap, turn the untold destruction you wreak into funds for your mad science research projects. Unlocking new variants for your kaiju, new locations to destroy, and interesting accessories.

data.short_description: Crush, smash, and eat thousands of enemies showing them what the meaning of destruction is! Kaiju Catastrophe is an arcade game with rogue-lite mechanics. Mutate devastating weapons, unlock permanent evolutions, and wreak havoc with a variety of monsters to tear humanity apart!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave or later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
